Question: Lockin(US) Inc CES 2024 product highlight and specification
Summary:
Lockin(US) Inc

CES 2024

- Introducing the latest smart lock technology
- Enhanced security features
- Seamless integration with smart home systems
- Remote access and control via mobile app
